comments.comment: Maddayath bayawela inne. Kohomada nagitinne minissu baya wela inne. RAJAPAKSA warunge guu kana eun alpayak innawa. Unta kadey gihin thun wela kanna epai .   Naththam gani  daruwo badaginnene. Badaginna niwa gannawata wada maha parumanayen kadey gihin hambu karagaththu pirisuth innawaa. Ithin un param para ganakatama hambu karaganna kadey yanawa. Obalath ratak palanaya karane. Ai hitlar wagey hitiye naththe? mey ratata awashsaya hitlar palanayak. Samaharunta renna  pukey guu nathath RAJAPAKSA mineemaru horunge natte ellila inne eykai. samahara nalika walin kanna weylak wath nath duppath paul pennala pitarata inna ayagen udaw illanawa. ithin eykata api pali naha maha loku pohottu anduwa waga kiyanna oone .  Aney hukey Lajja nathuwa pitarata seywaya karana minissungenma udaw  illanawane. Pitarata inne unge anduwen arapu eunda? Eetath ey minissu gahen kola kadanawa wagey. sallith kadanawa kiyala  hithanawada danne naha.  Hora mineemaru gotala sapa ganneth apey minissu pitarata idala duk mahanshiyen ewana mudal walin thamai . Ley hollanne mineemaruwekne rata palanaya karanne. obalageth palanaya  thibuna durwala kama thamai. Ley bona ekek obalageth hitiyanam ada ohoma kagahanna awasshaya naha.
comments.author: Nilanthi kumari Thalangama appuhamilage
